description: The 2021 World Athletics U20 Championships, also known as the World Junior Championships, are an international athletics competition for athletes qualifying as juniors (born no earlier than 1 January 2002), taking place from 17 to 22 August 2021 at the Nyayo Sports Complex in Nairobi, Kenya. Many major countries will not participate as the USA, Great Britain, Germany, Australia, China, Japan, New Zealand or Norway, amongst them.
title: 2021 World Athletics U20 Championships
